Narrator.name: Narrator
Narrator.desc: A 30-45 year old male. His voice is a rich, rhythmic baritone with a texture like heavy velvet. He speaks with a deliberate, atmospheric pace, utilizing pregnant pauses to build suspense. His tone is observant and cool, carrying the weight of a seasoned observer of London's shadows.

Sherlock Holmes.name: Sherlock Holmes
Sherlock Holmes.desc: A 30-40 year old male. His voice is crisp, sharp, and highly intellectual with a metallic edge. His pacing is rapid and clipped, as if his speech is struggling to keep up with his lightning-fast deductions. He sounds detached and restless, yet vibrantly alive with predatory curiosity.

Dr. Watson.name: Dr. Watson
Dr. Watson.desc: A 35-45 year old male. His voice is warm, steady, and resonant, reflecting his military background and medical profession. His tone is empathetic and grounded, with a moderate, comforting pace. He provides the human, emotional counterpoint to Holmes's cold logic.

Lady Evelyn.name: Lady Evelyn
Lady Evelyn.desc: A 20-30 year old young female. Her voice is melodic and high-class, but currently fractured by intense terror. Her breathing is shallow and audible, her speech punctuated by small, involuntary gasps. She sounds physically exhausted and emotionally pushed to the brink of a breakdown.
